flawed_nl_solution:
Miles will read for 4 hours because 24 x (1/6) = <<24*1/6=4>>4
He will read each type for 2 hours because 4 / 3 = 2
He will read 42 pages of novels because 21 x (2) = 42
He will read 60 pages of graphic novels because 30 x (2) = 60
He will read 90 pages of comic books because 45 x (2) = 90
He will read 192 pages in total because 42 + 60 + 90 = <<42+60+90=192>>192

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4/3, not 2. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
